data.text: Write this down: Less control is more control.

data.text: Now, but why do we strive for control so much?

translation.text: Bây giờ, nhưng tại sao chúng ta cố gắng kiểm soát rất nhiều?

data.text: It goes back to, because when an entrepreneur,

data.text: when we start the business we control everything,

data.text: we're the boss, it's our idea, it's our baby,

data.text: we put everything together,

data.text: we know the business inside and out.

translation.text: chúng tôi biết các doanh nghiệp trong và ngoài.

data.text: So, let me give you a definition of "business".
